range_sensor_driver.cpp
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 // Reads Ultra sonic sensor data from the USB port.
2 
3 #include <unicorn/range_sensor_driver.h>
4 
5 int main(int argc, char **argv)
6 {
7  ros::init(argc, argv, "range_sensor_driver");
8  RangeDriver range_driver;
9  ros::Rate r(100);
10  while(ros::ok())
11  {
12  range_driver.readLine();
13  range_driver.publishData();
14  ros::spinOnce();
15  r.sleep();
16  }
17  return 0;
18 }

20 RangeSensor::RangeSensor(std::string sensor_topic, std::string sensor_frame)
21 : TOPIC(sensor_topic)
22 {
23  range_pub_ = n_.advertise<sensor_msgs::Range>(TOPIC.c_str(), 0, this);
24  range_msg_.header.frame_id = sensor_frame.c_str();
25  range_msg_.radiation_type = sensor_msgs::Range::ULTRASOUND;
26  range_msg_.min_range = 0.2;
27  range_msg_.max_range = 8.0;
28  range_msg_.field_of_view = 15*M_PI/180;
29 }
30 
31 void RangeSensor::setRange(float range)
32 {
33  range_msg_.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
34  range_msg_.range = range;
35 }
36 
37 void RangeSensor::publishRange()
38 {
39  range_pub_.publish(range_msg_);
40 }

42 RangeDriver::RangeDriver()
43 {
44  std::string serial_port;
45  if(n_.getParam("range_sensor_driver/serial_port", serial_port))
46  {
47  SERIAL_PORT_ = serial_port;
48  ROS_INFO("[range_sensor_driver] Trying serial port: %s", serial_port.c_str());
49  }
50  else
51  {
52  SERIAL_PORT_ = "/dev/ttyACM0";
53  }
54  file_.open(SERIAL_PORT_.c_str());
55  if ( (file_.rdstate() & std::ifstream::failbit ) != 0 )
56  {
57  ROS_ERROR("[range_sensor_driver] Failed to find serial port!");
58  ros::shutdown();
59  }
60  std::vector<std::string> range_name_list;
61  /*"/move_base/local_costmap/sonar_layer/topics"*/
62  n_.getParam("range_sensor_driver/topics", range_name_list);
63  if (range_name_list.size() > 0)
64  {
65  for (int i = 0; i < range_name_list.size(); ++i)
66  {
67  ROS_INFO("[range_sensor_driver] frame_id: %s", std::string(std::string("base_")+range_name_list[i].substr(1,range_name_list[i].size())).c_str());
68  range_sensor_list_.push_back(new RangeSensor(range_name_list[i],
69  std::string("base_")+range_name_list[i].substr(1,range_name_list[i].size())));
70  }
71  }
72  else
73  {
74  ROS_WARN("[range_driver] No list of range sensors specified (range_sensor_list: [s1,s2,s3,...,sn])");
75  if (file_ >> range_data_)
76  {
77  int i = 0, index = 0;
78  while(index != range_data_.npos)
79  {
80  ROS_INFO("fisk");
81  index = range_data_.find_first_of(':', index);
82  index++;
83  if (index != 0)
84  {
85  range_sensor_list_.push_back(new RangeSensor(std::string("/ultrasonic_")+boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(i),
86  std::string("base_ultrasonic_")+boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(i)));
87  i++;
88  }
89  else
90  {
91  range_sensor_list_.pop_back();
92  return;
93  }
94  }
95  }
96  else
97  {
98  ROS_ERROR("[range_sensor_driver] Failed to read from serial port!");
99  ros::shutdown();
100  }
101 
102  }
103 }
104 RangeDriver::~RangeDriver()
105 {
106  file_.close();
107 }
108 
109 void RangeDriver::readLine()
110 {
111  if (file_ >> range_data_)
112  {
113  int i = 0, end_index = 0, start_index = 0;
114  start_index = range_data_.find_first_of(':', start_index);
115  start_index++;
116  while(end_index != range_data_.npos)
117  {
118  end_index = start_index;
119  end_index = range_data_.find_first_of(':', end_index);
120  if (end_index >= start_index)
121  {
122  try
123  {
124  float test = boost::lexical_cast<float>(range_data_.substr(start_index,end_index-start_index));
125  }
126  catch(boost::bad_lexical_cast &)
127  {
128  ROS_WARN("[range_sensor_driver] Bad serial reading!");
129  return;
130  }
131  range_sensor_list_[i]->setRange(boost::lexical_cast<float>(range_data_.substr(start_index,end_index-start_index)) / 100);
132  i++;
133  start_index = range_data_.find_first_of(':', start_index);
134  start_index++;
135  }
136  else
137  {
138  return;
139  }
140 
141  }
142  }
143 }
144 
145 void RangeDriver::publishData()
146 {
147  for (int i = 0; i < range_sensor_list_.size(); ++i)
148  {
149  range_sensor_list_[i]->publishRange();
150  }
151 }
